colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (YAN LAG BRGYAD PA'I SDOM PA 'BOGS PA'I CHO GA NYAMS SU BLANG BDE BA 'DI NI, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BU STON RIN PO CHE'I GSUNG RAB KYI DGONGS DON LTAR 'JAM DBYANGS BLA MA DKON MCHOG CHOS 'PHEL GYI PHYAG BZHES SU GNAS PA GZHI BYAS, TSIG DON RNAMS DKYUS SU BSHAD NA RTOGS DKA' BA, GSAL BYED KYI LHAN THABS LOGS SU KHA 'PHANGS TE, LAG LEN SNYING PO BSDUS PA 'DI NI, KHYIM PA RNAMS KYIS NYAMS SU BLANG BA BDE BA'I SLAD DU ZA HOR GYI BANDHE NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSOS BYANG TAL KHA SBYAR, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
